description: Number of classes generated by function A001222 when applied to binomial coefficients.
formula: a(n) = Length[ Union[ Table[ A001222[ binomial[ n, k ] ], {k, 0, n} ] ] ]
example: For n=9 A001222({C(9,k)})={0,2,4,4,4,4,4,4,2,0} includes 3 distinct values so generating 3 classes of k values: {0,9},{1,8} and {2,3,4,5,6,7}. So a(9)=3
author: _Labos Elemer_
